publisher.publisher-name: Military Operations Research Society in cooperation with the Military Applications Society (MAS) of the Institute for Operations Research and Management Science (INFORMS)

permissions.copyright-statement: © 2017, Military Operations Research Society and Military Application Society

ref.mixed-citation: Feller, William. 1968. An Introduction to Probability Theory and Its Applications, 3rd ed. John Wiley & Sons.

Greenwood, Major, and Yule, G. Udny. 1920. An Inquiry into the Nature of Frequency Distributions representative of Multiple Happenings with particular Reference to the Occurrence of Multiple Attacks of Disease or Repeated Accidents, Journal of the Royal Statistical Society, Vol 83, pp. 255–279.
Jaynes, E. T. 2003. Probability Theory: The Logic of Science. Cambridge University Press.

Koopman, Bernard Osgood. 1980. Search and Screening. Pergamon Press. Originally published in 1946 as OEG Report 56. Washington, DC, Operations Evaluation Group. Completely revised and republished by Pergamon in 1980, and by the Military Operations Research Society, 1990.
McCue, Brian. 2003a. A Justification of a Negative Binomial Model for Target Sightings, Military Operations Research, Vol 8, No 4.
McCue, Brian. 2003b. Matching the Negative Binomial Distribution to Data, Phalanx, Vol 36, No 4.
Winkler, Robert L, and Hays, William L. 1975. Statistics: Probability, Inference, and Decision. Harcourt School.
